name: Sarah Mitchell
content: We were drowning in paperwork and scheduling conflicts. Three Rivers Tech built us a custom patient management system that automated everything. We've saved 15 hours per week and our patients love the online booking. Best investment we've made in years.

name: Mike Rodriguez
content: Our old IT setup was costing us thousands in downtime every month. Three Rivers Tech did a complete assessment and moved us to the cloud. We've had zero major outages in 8 months and cut our IT costs by 35%. They explain everything in plain English, no tech jargon.

name: Jennifer Walsh
content: I was spending 10 hours a week on invoicing and client management. Their business software solution automated everything – now it takes me 30 minutes. The monthly cost pays for itself in the first week. Couldn't run my business without it now.

name: Robert Chen
content: Our main computer died right before a busy Monday morning. I called Three Rivers Tech in a panic and they had someone here within an hour. Not only did they fix it, but they recovered all our patient data and set up a backup system so this won't happen again. Lifesavers!

name: Amanda Foster
content: Three Rivers Tech doesn't just fix problems – they prevent them. They've been managing our IT for 2 years now and we haven't had a single major issue. Their proactive approach and honest communication make them feel like part of our team.

name: Tom Bradley
content: We needed a way to track job progress and materials in real-time. Three Rivers Tech built us a mobile app that our crews use on-site. Project efficiency is up 25% and we always know exactly where we stand on every job. Game changer for our business.
